,edu_user.SHOW_NAME showName ,edu_user.EMAIL email ,edu_user.PIC_IMG as picImg, edu_course.COURSE_NAME courseName, edu_course.COURSE_ID courseId from edu_comment left join edu_user on edu_comment.USER_ID=edu_user.USER_ID left join edu_course on edu_comment.OTHER_ID = edu_course.COURSE_ID
